website_summaries.verdict: Between her magical cape and fun water brush accessory, movie-accurate design, and perfect Barbie height, this is the ultimate Elsa doll.
pros: Apply water to Elsa’s cape using the included Magic Brush to reveal hidden images
12 inches tall, so works with most Barbie accessories
cons: Not much articulation on this doll

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It was for my 6 yr old granddaughter who loves it.. the wand could of been a little more kids friendly but worth it..
customer_reviews.author: ReginaPrachyl

customer_reviews.title: I hate that song but love the product
customer_reviews.text: My little loves this! And it doesn't sing "Let it go" , so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The doll does not Bend which makes it hard for her to do anything except stand in a boring position. The material that she's made of causes ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. The doll does not Bend which makes it hard for her to do anything except stand in a boring position. The material that she's made of causes her skin to get very dirty.
customer_reviews.author: samsung T679

customer_reviews.title: Mystery Pen Adds Interest
customer_reviews.text: Mystery Pen added an extra level of interest in these Frozen Dolls for 8 yr old nieces during Christmas gift exchange.
customer_reviews.author: DAX

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special for the price paid.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to paint. We did it as instructed, but still doesn't paint well on that fabric. The doll is as any "Barbie" type dolls of that kind.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with delivery driver!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my granddaughter. Was very cute. But driver needs to leave it in locker like he says not outside residents office where anyone can take it. I have Instructions to leave it by my door inside Gated community. Also packaging was damaged not giftable as is!

customer_reviews.title: My daughter did not like it as much you must keep the cape wet ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter did not like it as much you must keep the cape wet in order for it to show Anna and Olaf. If your child get bored easily I don't really recommend it. Mom of 2 girls
customer_reviews.author: Jen G

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and fun doll!
customer_reviews.text: Have this doll and I love it! Apart from the painting thing, I love that Elsa's dress is so soft and glittery. And the blue colour shade of this dress is probably the most beautiful I've seen on an Elsa doll. With that said she's very nice to have just for the doll itself. Now on to the painting activity. It's a really fun and nice element to the dolls. Love to see it complete and see how beautiful it looks! However it's a little bit hard to paint with the brush it comes with, so I used a bigger one of my own instead :D
customer_reviews.author: Msberann

customer_reviews.title: Item was not brand new- Top was stapled shut.
customer_reviews.text: Product has been previously opened and is not brand new like it says on the label. It came in a separate bag with other presents in the same box. The top has been stapled shut and has tape all around the top in attempt to put back together. Returning as it is NOT BRAND NEW.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Thomas

product_meta.title: Disney Frozen Elsa Magical Story Cape Doll - Beautiful Queen Elsa 12-Inch Doll - Use Water Wand to Paint Removable Cape to Reveal Surprise Images
product_meta.description: Elsa loves having her friends by her side and with Disney's Frozen Elsa's Magical Story Cape, your little girl can magically brush two of Elsa's favorite friends right on her cape! All she has to do is fill the included wand with water, brush it on the cape, and see Olaf and Anna magically appear! Once it dries, brush and reveal her friends again and again! Copyright Disney Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: MOVIE-INSPIRED DOLL - a beautiful, Disney princess dolls, this Frozen Elsa doll looks just like Elsa from the movie! She's dressed in her ice castle gown, ice shoes, and patterned, removable cape. Hair comes braided

REVEAL SURPRISE IMAGES - fill the included magic water brush with water by opening the top of the handle. Then nicely brush the inside of the cape and see Elsa dolls friends Anna and Olaf magically appear on your frozen doll
ACCESSORIES INCLUDED - the Disney frozen dolls detachable cape and heels come with your purchase so that Elsa's look can be complete. The blue magic wand brush also comes with your purchase
TRAVEL FRIEND - this Elsa frozen doll is 12 inches tall, which makes her a great size for a travel toy. Your kid can easily and safely bring princess elsa doll with them on all their magic adventures
AN IDEAL PRESENT - this disney elsa doll makes for a sweet birthday, holiday, and more present. Any child would love the chance to paint the story doll's cape and reveal the surpris

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars124 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
